pages.text: $(li)Name Tags can be used to change the name of any Creature in this world.$(br)$(li)They can be found in Loot Chests.$(br)$(li)Librarians will exchange your Emeralds by Name Tags too.

$(li)First, in an Anvil, you can change the name of a Name Tag in exchange of a Level of experience.$(br)$(li)Then, you only have to right click to any kind of creature while you are holding a Name Tag on your hand.$(br)$(li)Additionally, the most of creatures that have a custon name applied with a Name Tag will never naturally despawn.
